title: Your Lie in April, Vol. 11
description: THE LAST MOVEMENTKaori undergoes surgery even as Kosei performs in his competition, each of them as vulnerable as ever, but finally embracing the courage to take these ultimate risks. As their journey together draws to a close, the music of their hearts lays bare the truth of their friendshipâ€”a friendship that may have begun with an April lie, but which has changed their lives and the lives of everyone around them.FINAL VOLUME!
author: Naoshi Arakawa
